Text:
So far, the download is working great. Really an excellent bunch of Japanese videos. The reason for smaller collections is the ability to download each group separately instead of waiting for the entire collection to download. In other words, if it's in two batches instead of one, I can download the entire collection twice as fast. 

Thanks again.

User Type: st download what you want. I'd actually release each movie as a separate release
Username: but as most titles in the site are in Japanese i can't write out the title to the torrent so batch dl's with random names are the only option :x"
